    public class Board.ActiveSquare
extends Board.Square
    ActiveSquare class.

    Extends the Board.Square class... piece : the piece located on this square, either null, MAN or KING. label : the label corresponding to this square, according to notation rules - either numeric or alphanumeric values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActiveSquare

        public ActiveSquare(int row,
                    int col)
        Generic constructor for an ActiveSquare object (playable square).
        Parameters:
        row - : the row number on the board internal representation.
        col - : the column number on the board internal representation.

      • ActiveSquare

        public ActiveSquare(int row,
                    int col,
                    Piece piece)
        Constructor for an ActiveSquare object (playable square).

        Parameters:
        row - : the row number on the board internal representation.
        col - : the column number on the board internal representation. This constructor also add a Piece object to the ActiveSquare.
        piece - : the piece (Piece object) located on the square: - either null, MAN or KING,
        - and either BLACK or WHITE.

    • Method Detail

        public void addPiece(Piece piece)
        Adds a piece to this square
        Parameters:
        piece - : the piece to add. Adds a Piece object to this Square,
        Throws:
        OccupiedSquareException - if a piece is already located on the square.

      • removePiece

        public void removePiece()
        Removes, if existing, this Square's Piece object piece.
        Throws:
        EmptySquareException - if the square is already empty.

      • getLabel

        public java.lang.String getLabel()
        Accessor for this Square's label.

        Returns:
        label encoded according to the PDN standard.

        Square label is either encoded with a numeric or an alphanumeric notation according to the PDN.

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece()
        Returns:
        the Piece object piece, if any, located on this Square.

        Possible return values are null or a Piece object (MAN or King):

        Returned piece is "on the square."

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if this Square is empty.

      • isOccupied

        public boolean isOccupied()
        Returns:
        true if a piece is located on this Square.

        true if the square
